title: Exploring Matrix Solutions and Solution Set Types in Linear Algebra

context.prior_knowledge: Basic matrix operations and understanding of linear systems of equations
context.additional_context: Learning support in limited-technology environments through smartphone-based supplementary materials

learning_goals: Connect the range of coefficient and augmented matrices to solution set types (unique solution, infinite solutions, no solution).
Determine the existence and uniqueness of solutions by comparing determinants, ranks, and augmented matrices.
Model linear systems applied to real-world engineering problems using matrix solutions and analyze solution sets.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
